name: Stinger!
overview: A multi-scrolling shooter As the most famous and skilled pilot in the USB, you have been given the mission to enter the star bee system - to seek out and destroy the Star Queen in her hive. To accomplish this task, you are being given command of the most advanced starfighter ever built. It is armed with a particle beam cannon, powerful plasma engines and a segmented energy shield. One last thing.... the fate of the galaxy rests on your shoulders. Don't blow it!
